item.title: Traffic lights are an accident waiting to happen!, 20th November
item.description:
The traffic lights put here are downright dangerous! The roundabout before traffic lights was fine and traffic flowed. Now traffic backs up all around the roundabout in morning and evening rush hours. Cars swerve into the wrong lanes and I have witnessed many a near miss along with road rage. Please please please for safetys sake, remove these traffic lights ASAP!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stifford Interchange, Grays
Report on FixMyStreet
